note.p: Scottish wine merchant, naturalist, antiquarian, and archaeologist. Based in Edinburgh.
Census returns of Scotland 1891 (The National Archives of Scotland: Edinburgh St Cuthberts 89/9/5)
Scotland old parish registers births 685/2 360 452 St Cuthbert’s (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 2 December 2021)
Scotland statutory deaths 685/6 109 Newington (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 2 December 2021)
Transactions of the Botanical Society of Edinburgh 31 (1932): 238
